      • enableSquareSelection

        public void enableSquareSelection(TargetType selectType,
                                  java.util.List<Target> squares,
                                  boolean move,
                                  boolean skippable)
        Makes the given squares clickable in the grid
        Parameters:
        squares - target squares
        selectType - the type of select action
        move - whether to add a move attribute to the tile pane
        skippable - whether the user can skip the selection

      • enableTargetSelection

        public void enableTargetSelection(java.util.List<Target> targets,
                                  boolean skippable)
        Makes the given players clickable in the grid
        Parameters:
        targets - target players
        skippable - whether the user can skip the selection
